title: Evil Dead II
review: Ok the first movie was silly, but this is ridiculous. I feel like it goes too hard from the start, rather than letting the insanity ramp up. Turning everything up to 11 hasn't necessarily made it a better film than the first one. Having said that, I did like it and everything I said about the first one applies to this too. I can't exactly complain about a feeling of repetition, as it was my choice to watch so many similar films this month.
